Additional: Calculus-based introduction to Newtonian mechanics. Kinematics and dynamics of particles and systems of particles, conservation laws, rotational motion, gravitation, and oscillatory motion. Prerequisites: credit or concurrent enrollment in MTH 141 and concurrent enrollment in PHY 273. Intended for science and engineering majors. Textbook: University Physics (OpenStax), 1st Edition, Volume 1. Course uses Brightspace for announcements and lectures. Examinations include three unit exams and a cumulative final exam. Homework administered through WebAssign. Recitation registration required. Anti-Bias and Disability Services statements included. Academic Enhancement Center information provided. COVID-19 policies included.
